frame.name: Popularity
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Evaluee</fen>, which can be a person or an object, has an amount of acceptability or utilization based on general (often non-aesthetic) desirability. The <fen>Judge</fen> who determines the <fen>Evaluee</fen>'s desirability may be mentioned.
<ex><fex name="Evaluee">Frank Sinatra</fex> is <t>cool</t> again.</ex> <ex><fex name="Evaluee">Web 2.0</fex> is <fex name="Degree">so</fex> <t>in</t> <fex name="Time">right now</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Evaluee
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person or object that is being evaluated for its desirability.
<ex>I heard he's a <t>cool</t> <fex name="Evaluee">guy</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>A description of how desirable the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is.
<ex>Hanna Montana is <fex name="Degree">really</fex> <t>cool</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Judge
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person who decides how desirable the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is.
<ex>Knitting is <t>cool</t> <fex name="Judge">to your grandma</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time when the Evaluee is judged to be desirable.
<ex>Go-go boots were <t>popular</t> <fex name="Time">in the 60s</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The geographic area where an <fen>Evaluee</fen> is considered desirable.
<ex>Electronica is <t>all the rage</t> <fex name="Place">in Europe</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: popular.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: accepted as desirable to a group of (often young) people

lexUnit.name: cool.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: desirable, worthy of emulation or acquisition

lexUnit.name: in.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: in a state of temporary social acceptability

lexUnit.name: hot.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: regarded as desirable or popular, according to aesthetic, non-aesthetic, temporal, or categorical factors.
